titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish procedures for relief from joint and several liability on a joint tax return for individuals requesting such relief due to domestic violence or abuse.

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish procedures for relief from joint and several liability on a joint tax return for individuals requesting such relief due to domestic violence or abuse.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
